ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment
Class EnactmentEnterpriseAgent

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Agent
      ei.EIAgent
          ei.agent.enterpriseagent.EnterpriseAgent
              ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment.EnactmentEnterpriseAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutomaticEnterpriseAgent
public abstract class EnactmentEnterpriseAgent
extends EnterpriseAgent

This abstract class is the basis for developing agents that can (automatically) respond to events generated in the contract enactment phase. Such events are received from the normative environment as a result of its contract monitoring task.

Author:
hlc
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

EnactmentEnterpriseAgent

public EnactmentEnterpriseAgent()
Method Detail

setup

protected void setup()
Description copied from class: EIAgent
This setup method:
  • iterates through the arguments provided to the agent to build the Properties object accordingly
  • registers the SL and Leap languages
  • registers the ei-management ontology
  • generates the public/private key pair for this agent
  • creates a responder behaviour for the EI_MANAGEMENT_ONTOLOGY
When extending this class, override this method to create agent behaviour(s) and invoke super.setup().

Overrides:
setup in class EnterpriseAgent
